languages.text:
The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, this attack will ignore enemy block and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.
languages.original_text: Следующая атака цели игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытия{/g}, а ее эффективная дальность увеличивается вдвое. Если на цель действует {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} Приказ командира, эта атака игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} противника, а {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} никаким способом нельзя опустить ниже {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%.

traits.locale_text:
The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance.
If the target is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of voice of command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} and the damage from this attack can't be reduced below <u>(30 + 3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% for any reason.

The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance.
If the target is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of voice of command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} and the damage from this attack can't be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy block and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

languages.text:
Der nächste Angriff des Ziels ignoriert die {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} und ist auf doppelte Entfernung effektiv.
Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} steht, ignoriert dieser Angriff das feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und Blocken. Der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch diesen Angriff kann zudem unter keinen Umständen auf unter {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % reduziert werden.
languages.original_text:
The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, this attack will ignore enemy block and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

traits.locale_text:
Der nächste Angriff des Ziels ignoriert die {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} und ist auf doppelte Entfernung effektiv.
Wenn das Ziel unter dem {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} von Stimme des Kommandos steht, ignoriert dieser Angriff das feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}, und der Schaden von diesem Angriff kann unter keinen Umständen auf unter {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % reduziert werden.

Der nächste Angriff des Ziels ignoriert die {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} und ist auf doppelte Entfernung effektiv. Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, ignoriert dieser Angriff das feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und Blocken. Der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch diesen Angriff kann zudem unter keinen Umständen auf unter {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % reduziert werden.

languages.text:
L'attaque suivante de la cible ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} et sa distance efficace est doublée.
Si la cible est sous l'effet de la capacité {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g}, cette attaque ignore le blocage et l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de l'ennemi. De plus, les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de cette attaque ne peuvent pas être inférieurs à {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % pour quelque raison que ce soit.
languages.original_text:
The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, this attack will ignore enemy block and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

traits.locale_text:
L'attaque suivante de la cible ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} et sa distance effective est doublée.
Si la cible est sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de la capacité Voix du Commandement, cette attaque ignore l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de l'ennemi et les dégâts de celle-ci ne peuvent pas être inférieurs à {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % pour quelque raison que ce soit.

L'attaque suivante de la cible ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} et sa distance efficace est doublée. De plus, les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de cette attaque ne peuvent pas être inférieurs à {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % pour quelque raison que ce soit.

De plus, les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de cette attaque ne peuvent pas être inférieurs à {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % pour quelque raison que ce soit.

L'attaque suivante de la cible ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} et sa distance efficace est doublée. Si la cible est sous l'effet de la capacité Voix du commandement, cette attaque ignore l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et le blocage de l'ennemi. De plus, les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de cette attaque ne peuvent pas être inférieurs à {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % pour quelque raison que ce soit.

languages.text:
El siguiente ataque del objetivo ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} y tiene el doble de distancia eficaz.
Si el objetivo está bajo los efectos de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g}, este ataque ignorará la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y el bloqueo del enemigo y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} no podrá reducirse por debajo del {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % por ningún motivo.

If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, this attack will ignore enemy block and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

traits.locale_text:
El siguiente ataque del objetivo ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} y tiene el doble de distancia eficaz.
Si el objetivo está bajo los {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efectos{/g} de Voz de mando, este ataque ignorará la {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} del enemigo y el daño no podrá reducirse por debajo del {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % por ningún motivo.

Si el objetivo está bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, este ataque ignorará la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y el bloqueo del enemigo y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} no podrá reducirse por debajo del {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % por ningún motivo.

languages.text:
目标的下次攻击会忽略{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}，且有效射程翻倍。
如果目标处于{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}效果下，则此次攻击还会忽略敌人的闪避与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}格挡{/g}，且此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不会因为任何效果降低至{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%以下。

Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

目标的下次攻击会忽略{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}，且有效射程翻倍。
如果目标处于指挥之声{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}下，则此次攻击还会忽略敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}，且此次攻击的伤害不会因为任何效果降低至{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%以下。

目标的下次攻击会忽略{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}，且有效射程翻倍。 如果目标处于指挥之声效果下，则此次攻击还会忽略敌人的闪避与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}格挡{/g}，且此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不会因为任何效果降低至{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%以下。

目标的下次攻击会忽略{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}，且有效射程翻倍。 如果目标处于指挥之声效果下，则此次攻击还会忽略敌人{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，且此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不会由于任何效果降低至{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%以下。

目标的下次攻击会忽略{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}，且有效射程翻倍。 如果目标处于指挥之声效果下，则此次攻击还会忽略敌人{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、格挡，且此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不会由于任何效果降低至{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%以下。

languages.text: ターゲットの次の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}を無視し、有効距離が2倍になる。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果の下にある場合、この攻撃は敵のブロックと{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を無視し、この攻撃による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}はどんな理由があっても{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%を下回ることはない。
languages.original_text: The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy block and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

traits.locale_text:
ターゲットの次の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}を無視し、有効距離が2倍になる。
ターゲットが指揮の声の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}の下にある場合、この攻撃は敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ドッジ{/g}を無視し、この攻撃によるダメージはどんな理由があっても{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%を下回ることはない。

ターゲットが指揮の声の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}の下にある場合、この攻撃は敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}を無視し、この攻撃によるダメージはどんな理由があっても<u>(30 + 3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>％を下回ることはない。

ターゲットの次の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}を無視し、有効距離が2倍になる。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果の下にある場合、この攻撃は敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を無視し、この攻撃による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}はどんな理由があっても{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%を下回ることはない。

Если на цель действует {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказ командира{/g}, эта атака игнорирует блок и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} противника, а {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} никаким способом нельзя опустить ниже {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%.

languages.text:
Hedefin bir sonraki saldırısı, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperi{/g} yok sayar ve saldırının etkili mesafesi iki katına çıkar.
Hedef, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g}'nün etkisi altındaysa saldırı, düşmanın bloklama ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerlerini yok sayar. Ayrıca saldırının vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, hiçbir sebeple %{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} değerinin altına düşemez.

The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, this attack will ignore enemy block and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance.
If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and block. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

If the target is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and block. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.
